item.title: Open Access Mandates
item.description: Here are some notes on how the six features can be achieved using nothing else but “stuff on the internet”. I won’t provide detailed arguments, but just quick notes on how each of these features can already be implemented with minimal cost to researchers…

item.title: Bayesian Estimation of Signal Detection Models, Part 3
item.description: This post is the third part in a series of blog posts on Signal Detection models: In the first part, I described how to estimate the equal variance Gaussian SDT (EVSDT) model for a single participant, using Bayesian (generalized linear and nonlinear) modeling…

item.title: Bayesian Estimation of Signal Detection Models, Part 2
item.description: This post is the second part of a series of three blog posts: In the first part, I described how to estimate the equal variance Gaussian SDT (EVSDT) model for a single participant, using Bayesian (generalized linear and nonlinear) modeling techniques…

item.title: Bayesian Estimation of Signal Detection Models, Part 1
item.description: This post is the first part of a series of three blog posts: In the second part, I describe how to estimate the equal variance Gaussian SDT model for multiple participants simultaneously, using hierarchical Bayesian models…
